name: Blit Software
description: Blit Software is a company specialized in the development of applications with real-time graphics. With a long experience in 3D rendering engines, video streaming and gaming software, Blit Software makes the most of the technology to achieve user experiences tailored to the multi-screen world in which we live. Its team of over 20 engineers has created world wide applications for outstanding clients such as MotoGP, Mediapro / LFP, Movistar and Sony Computer Entertainment.
